thread.section_title: Bikes2udirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bikes2udirect | www.bikes2udirect.com
thread.title: Joseph Deacon

author: Joseph Deacon
title: Joseph Deacon
text: I needed a bike for my sons birthday and he loved the look of the Dawes Blowfish so I called to see if I could have next day delivery, they said normally only bikes ordered before 9am could be delivered next day but agreed to help me out as I was really under the cosh with the missus! True to their word I received the bike in perfect nick next day and my boy loved it! We both enjoyed putting it together too and learned a bit along the way like screwing the left pedal in anti clockwise! You guys really helped me out, thanks again, good job.
